name: audit_checklists-app
description: A comprehensive web and mobile application for conducting restaurant audits and checklists. This application helps restaurant managers and auditors track compliance, safety, and quality standards.

scripts.build:apk:preview: cd mobile && npx eas build --platform android --profile preview --local --output app-preview.apk
scripts.build:apk:release: cd mobile && npx eas build --platform android --profile release --local --output app-release.apk
